name: Geometrical Space Shooter
description:
A top-down shooter game made for Trijam #166! The theme was "Upgrade your weapons"

(Worktime was about 7 hours, there was a stupid bug with the waves which took me an eternity to figure out how to fix)

In this game you're a triangle in the outer space, and you have to kill multiple hexagons which will come at you. There are 7 waves: whenever you clear a wave, your weapon will always receive a damage and speed upgrade, but there'll also be a major upgrade in some waves, which will spice up the gameplay.

Controls:
Keyboard:
WASD to move
Move cursor to aim
Left mouse button/Space to shoot
Gamepad:
Left joystick to move
Right joystick to aim
Right trigger to shoot

Goal
Get past all the 7 waves
